description:
A horizontal layout component. NeonInline provides a way of laying out it's contents with standard gaps. At the
specified breakpoint the layout will wrap to vertical.

props.name: gap
props.description: Size of the gap between items

props.name: breakpoint
props.description: Breakpoint at which to layout switches to vertical. TIP: Pass breakpoint="" to override the default breakpoint & prevent switching to a vertical layout.
